divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I out on back deck facing north, saw 2 red pulsing objects, no sound, slowly flying west to east, with the trailing object slowly getting closer to lead object. Unlike any airplane I've ever seen, no blinking lights, slow pulse and very red, roundish object.
Summary: 2 red pulsing lights changed direction, then went west to east, last one slowly getting closer to lead object.
trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Charlotte
There were 2 other sightings in Charlotte on or around December 25th 2011
